description: The contract requires a person recognized as an Elder by their community to provide spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous offenders. The contract will operate for four months, and there may be an option to extend for up to four additional years. The expected duration and value of the contract are six years, and the estimated value of the contract is $427,157.64 GST/HST extra.

## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Elder Services in Ontario Region

### Reference Number
cb-696-74738308

### Solicitation Number
21460-29-4885076

### Publication Date
14 November 2024

### Tender Closing Date and Time
29 November 2024, 14:00:00 EST

### Contract Start Date and Duration
02 December 2024 to 31 March 2025, with an option to extend for an additional 4 years

### Description
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking the services of an Elder to provide spiritual and cultural guidance to Indigenous offenders in the Ontario Region. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering Elder Services, which include:

- Spiritual and ceremonial services
- Counseling and guidance
- Case management
- Regional and national meetings

### Criteria for Assessment

- The supplier must be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor within that community.
- The supplier must have a minimum of five (5) years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services and teachings to Indigenous people, with experience in:
  - Counseling and guidance
  - Familiarity with and ability to conduct traditional ceremonies
- The supplier must be familiar with and able to provide guidance to staff and offenders on the use, disposition, and searching of traditional medicines and spiritual effects.
- The supplier must meet with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC to validate their statement of capabilities.

### Procurement Details

- This procurement is set-aside for an Indigenous Supplier, as required by the Government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
- Suppliers must be able to provide evidence of their Indigenous status.
- The estimated value of the contract is $427,157.64 (GST/HST extra).
- The contract will be awarded based on a statement of capabilities submitted by the interested supplier.

### Contact Information

- For inquiries and to submit a statement of capabilities, please contact:
  Danielle Murdoch, Regional Contract Administrator
  Correctional Service Canada, Ontario Region
  Telephone: 343-422-4831
  Email: danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
  Date of notice: 14 November 2024
